trans-unit.source: Inf2Cat Properties for Driver Package Projects
trans-unit.target: Inf2Cat Properties for Driver Package Projects

trans-unit.source: Sets the properties for the [**Inf2Cat**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff547089) tool.
trans-unit.target: Sets the properties for the [**Inf2Cat**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff547089) tool.

trans-unit.source: The **Inf2Cat** tool can be used to create catalog files for any driver package that has an INF file.
trans-unit.target: The **Inf2Cat** tool can be used to create catalog files for any driver package that has an INF file.

trans-unit.source: Setting Inf2Cat properties for driver package projects
trans-unit.target: Setting Inf2Cat properties for driver package projects

trans-unit.source: Open the property pages for your driver package.
trans-unit.target: Open the property pages for your driver package.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the driver package project in Solution Explorer and select **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the driver package project in Solution Explorer and select **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: In the property pages for the driver package, click **Configuration Properties** and then click **Inf2Cat**.
trans-unit.target: In the property pages for the driver package, click **Configuration Properties** and then click **Inf2Cat**.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Run Inf2Cat** option.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Run Inf2Cat** option.

trans-unit.source: This option runs the [**Inf2Cat**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff547089) tool on any INF files in the project (for example, .inf, .inx, or .inv files).
trans-unit.target: This option runs the [**Inf2Cat**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff547089) tool on any INF files in the project (for example, .inf, .inx, or .inv files).

trans-unit.source: If the driver package is installed by using an INF file, use the Inf2Cat tool to create the catalog file.
trans-unit.target: If the driver package is installed by using an INF file, use the Inf2Cat tool to create the catalog file.

trans-unit.source: Inf2Cat validates that files referenced in the INF file are present in the package.
trans-unit.target: Inf2Cat validates that files referenced in the INF file are present in the package.

trans-unit.source: To add files to the package, use the property pages for the package project and driver project.
trans-unit.target: To add files to the package, use the property pages for the package project and driver project.

trans-unit.source: See [Creating a Driver Package](creating_a_driver_package.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: See [Creating a Driver Package](creating_a_driver_package.md) for more information.

trans-unit.source: Option
trans-unit.target: Option

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Run Inf2Cat
trans-unit.target: Run Inf2Cat

trans-unit.source: Runs the Inf2Cat tool on any INF files in the project (for example, .inf, .inx, or .inv files).
trans-unit.target: Runs the Inf2Cat tool on any INF files in the project (for example, .inf, .inx, or .inv files).

trans-unit.source: Windows Version List
trans-unit.target: Windows Version List

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of Windows versions supported by the .inf file.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a list of Windows versions supported by the .inf file.

trans-unit.source: Separate each Windows version with a comma.
trans-unit.target: Separate each Windows version with a comma.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is $(Inf2CatWindowsVersionList), a macro that builds the driver for the active platform and configuration.
trans-unit.target: The default setting is $(Inf2CatWindowsVersionList), a macro that builds the driver for the active platform and configuration.

trans-unit.source: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /os:WindowsVersionList.
trans-unit.target: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /os:WindowsVersionList.

trans-unit.source: Include Page Hashes
trans-unit.target: Include Page Hashes

trans-unit.source: Include page hashes with files.
trans-unit.target: Include page hashes with files.

trans-unit.source: Optionally followed by a list of files.
trans-unit.target: Optionally followed by a list of files.

trans-unit.source: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /pageHashes[:file1][,file2]...].
trans-unit.target: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /pageHashes[:file1][,file2]...].

trans-unit.source: Add PE Attribute
trans-unit.target: Add PE Attribute

trans-unit.source: Adds a PE catalog attribute to files.
trans-unit.target: Adds a PE catalog attribute to files.

trans-unit.source: Optionally followed by a list of files.
trans-unit.target: Optionally followed by a list of files.

trans-unit.source: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /pe[:file1[,file2]...].
trans-unit.target: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /pe[:file1[,file2]...].

trans-unit.source: Add Drm
trans-unit.target: Add Drm

trans-unit.source: Adds a DRM-level catalog attribute to files.
trans-unit.target: Adds a DRM-level catalog attribute to files.

trans-unit.source: Optionally followed by a list of files.
trans-unit.target: Optionally followed by a list of files.

trans-unit.source: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /drm[:file1[,file2]...].
trans-unit.target: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /drm[:file1[,file2]...].

trans-unit.source: Verbose
trans-unit.target: Verbose

trans-unit.source: Displays detailed information about tool output in the Visual Studio Output window.
trans-unit.target: Displays detailed information about tool output in the Visual Studio Output window.

trans-unit.source: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /verbose.
trans-unit.target: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /verbose.

trans-unit.source: No Catalog
trans-unit.target: No Catalog

trans-unit.source: Prevents the creation of any catalog files.
trans-unit.target: Prevents the creation of any catalog files.

trans-unit.source: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /nocat.
trans-unit.target: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /nocat.

trans-unit.source: Use Local Time
trans-unit.target: Use Local Time

trans-unit.source: Use the local time zone while verifying the INF DriverVer Directive directive.
trans-unit.target: Use the local time zone while verifying the INF DriverVer Directive directive.

trans-unit.source: By default UTC, is used.
trans-unit.target: By default UTC, is used.

trans-unit.source: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /uselocaltime.
trans-unit.target: This setting is equivalent to specifying the Inf2Cat option /uselocaltime.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Inf2Cat tool, see [Using Inf2Cat to Create a Catalog File](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff553618).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the Inf2Cat tool, see [Using Inf2Cat to Create a Catalog File](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff553618).

trans-unit.source: For information about property pages and projects, see the [WDK and Visual Studio build environment](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh454286).
trans-unit.target: For information about property pages and projects, see the [WDK and Visual Studio build environment](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh454286).
